      • withWhitelistPackages

        public ClasspathScanningRegistry.Builder withWhitelistPackages(String... whitelistPackages)
        Sets the whitelist packages.

        When whitelist packages are provided, the classpath scanner will only scan those packages which are specified.

        Parameters:
        whitelistPackages - the whitelist packages
        Returns:
        the registry builder

      • build

        public AtomixRegistry build()
        Description copied from interface: Builder
        Builds the object.

        The returned object may be a new instance of the built class or a recycled instance, depending on the semantics of the builder implementation. Users should never assume that a builder allocates a new instance.

        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder<AtomixRegistry>
        Returns:
        The built object.
